B

bounds - Variable in class Canvas
The bounds of the canvas.
BROWN - Static variable in class Canvas
The color brown.

C

Canvas - Class in <Unnamed>
User interface for a Logo-like language.
Canvas() - Constructor for class Canvas
 
chooseColor(Color) - Method in class Canvas
Choose the specified color for further painting.

D

drawForward(int) - Method in class Canvas
Draws a line of length length in the current direction.
drawTextLabel(String) - Method in class Canvas
Draws a box with the text text at the current position.

G

GREEN - Static variable in class Canvas
The color green.

M

move(double, double) - Method in class Canvas
Moves the current position by x units to the right and y units down according to the current orientation (so if the orientation is rotated by 180 degrees, the move goes left and up instead of right and down).
moveForward(int) - Method in class Canvas
Moves the current position by length units in the current direction without drawing anything.

P

pop() - Method in class Canvas
Sets the current position and orientation to the top-most stored position and orientation.
push() - Method in class Canvas
Stores the current position and orientation.

R

refresh() - Method in class Canvas
Refreshes the shown frame.
rotate(int) - Method in class Canvas
Turns the current orientation by degrees degrees (360 degrees form a circle) clockwise.

S

square(double) - Method in class Canvas
Draws a filled square of the specified length length at the current position and with the current orientation.
